```{r}
vec_1 <- c(2, 5, 9, 10, 8, 12, 1, 0)
class(vec_1)
```

```{r}
typeof(vec_1)
```

```{r}
vec_1_e3 <- vec_1[3]
vec_1_e3
```

```{r}
vec_1_e1 <- vec_1[1]
vec_1_e1
```

```{r}
vec_1_e5to7 <- vec_1[5:7]
vec_1_e5to7
```

```{r}
vec_1_char <- as.character[vec_1]
vec_1_char
```

```{r}
vec_2 <- c(town = "Santa Barbara",
           location = "Rincon",
           swell = "South")
class(vec_2)

```

```{r}
length(vec_2)
```

```{r}
vec_2_e2 <- vec_2[2]
vec_2_e2
```

```{r}
df_1 <- data.frame(region = c("A", "B", "A", "D"),
                  species = c("otter", "great white", "sea lion", "gray scale"),
                  count = c(12, 2, 36, 6))
df_1
```

```{r}
class(df_1)
```

```{r}
df_1[[2]]

```

```{r}
max_count <- subset(df_1, count == 36)
max_count
```
